go_to_point_action.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 #! /usr/bin/env python
2 # import ros stuff
3 import rospy
4 from sensor_msgs.msg import LaserScan
5 from geometry_msgs.msg import Twist, Point, Pose
6 from nav_msgs.msg import Odometry
7 from tf import transformations
8 import math
9 import actionlib
10 import actionlib.msg
11 import motion_plan.msg
12 from std_msgs.msg import Int32
13 
14 
15 # robot state variables
16 position_ = Point()
17 pose_ = Pose()
18 yaw_ = 0
19 # machine state
20 state_ = 0
21 # goal
22 desired_position_ = Point()
23 desired_position_.z = 0
24 # parameters
25 yaw_precision_ = math.pi / 9 # +/- 20 degree allowed
26 yaw_precision_2_ = math.pi / 90 # +/- 2 degree allowed
27 dist_precision_ = 0.1
28 kp_a = 3.0 ## In ROS Noetic, it may be necessary to change the sign of this proportional controller
29 kp_d = 0.2
30 ub_a = 0.6
31 lb_a = -0.5
32 ub_d = 0.6
33 
34 # publisher
35 pub = None
36 
37 # action_server
38 act_s = None
39 
40 # callbacks
41 
42 def clbk_odom(msg):
43  global position_
44  global pose_
45  global yaw_
46 
47  # position
48  position_ = msg.pose.pose.position
49  pose_ = msg.pose.pose
50 
51  # yaw
52  quaternion = (
53  msg.pose.pose.orientation.x,
54  msg.pose.pose.orientation.y,
55  msg.pose.pose.orientation.z,
56  msg.pose.pose.orientation.w)
57  euler = transformations.euler_from_quaternion(quaternion)
58  yaw_ = euler[2]
59 
60 
61 def change_state(state):
62  global state_
63  state_ = state
64  print ('State changed to [%s]' % state_)
65 
66 
67 def normalize_angle(angle):
68  if(math.fabs(angle) > math.pi):
69  angle = angle - (2 * math.pi * angle) / (math.fabs(angle))
70  return angle
71 
72 
73 def fix_yaw(des_pos):
74  global yaw_, pub, yaw_precision_2_, state_
75  desired_yaw = math.atan2(des_pos.y - position_.y, des_pos.x - position_.x)
76  err_yaw = normalize_angle(desired_yaw - yaw_)
77  rospy.loginfo(err_yaw)
78 
79  twist_msg = Twist()
80  if math.fabs(err_yaw) > yaw_precision_2_:
81  twist_msg.angular.z = kp_a*err_yaw
82  if twist_msg.angular.z > ub_a:
83  twist_msg.angular.z = ub_a
84  elif twist_msg.angular.z < lb_a:
85  twist_msg.angular.z = lb_a
86 
87  pub.publish(twist_msg)
88 
89  # state change conditions
90  if math.fabs(err_yaw) <= yaw_precision_2_:
91  print ('Yaw error: [%s]' % err_yaw)
92  change_state(1)
93 
94 
95 def go_straight_ahead(des_pos):
96  global yaw_, pub, yaw_precision_, state_
97  desired_yaw = math.atan2(des_pos.y - position_.y, des_pos.x - position_.x)
98  err_yaw = desired_yaw - yaw_
99  err_pos = math.sqrt(pow(des_pos.y - position_.y, 2) +
100  pow(des_pos.x - position_.x, 2))
101  err_yaw = normalize_angle(desired_yaw - yaw_)
102  rospy.loginfo(err_yaw)
103 
104  if err_pos > dist_precision_:
105  twist_msg = Twist()
106  twist_msg.linear.x = 0.3
107  if twist_msg.linear.x > ub_d:
108  twist_msg.linear.x = ub_d
109 
110  twist_msg.angular.z = kp_a*err_yaw
111  pub.publish(twist_msg)
112  else:
113  print ('Position error: [%s]' % err_pos)
114  change_state(2)
115 
116  # state change conditions
117  if math.fabs(err_yaw) > yaw_precision_:
118  print ('Yaw error: [%s]' % err_yaw)
119  change_state(0)
120 
121 
122 def done():
123  twist_msg = Twist()
124  twist_msg.linear.x = 0
125  twist_msg.angular.z = 0
126  pub.publish(twist_msg)
127 
128 
129 def planning(goal):
130 
131  global state_, desired_position_
132  global act_s
133 
134  desired_position_.x = goal.target_pose.pose.position.x
135  desired_position_.y = goal.target_pose.pose.position.y
136 
137  state_ = 0
138  rate = rospy.Rate(20)
139  success = True
140 
141  feedback = motion_plan.msg.PlanningFeedback()
142  result = motion_plan.msg.PlanningResult()
143 
144  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
145  if act_s.is_preempt_requested():
146  rospy.loginfo('Goal was preempted')
147  act_s.set_preempted()
148  success = False
149  break
150  elif state_ == 0:
151  feedback.stat = "Fixing the yaw"
152  feedback.position = pose_
153  act_s.publish_feedback(feedback)
154  fix_yaw(desired_position_)
155  elif state_ == 1:
156  feedback.stat = "Angle aligned"
157  feedback.position = pose_
158  act_s.publish_feedback(feedback)
159  go_straight_ahead(desired_position_)
160  elif state_ == 2:
161  feedback.stat = "Target reached!"
162  feedback.position = pose_
163  act_s.publish_feedback(feedback)
164  done()
165  break
166  else:
167  rospy.logerr('Unknown state!')
168 
169  rate.sleep()
170  if success:
171  rospy.loginfo('Goal: Succeeded!')
172  act_s.set_succeeded(result)
173 
174 
175 def main():
176  global pub, active_, act_s
177  rospy.init_node('go_to_point2')
178  pub = rospy.Publisher('/robot2/cmd_vel', Twist, queue_size=1)
179  sub_odom = rospy.Subscriber('/robot2/odom', Odometry, clbk_odom)
180  act_s = actionlib.SimpleActionServer(
181  '/reaching_goal2', motion_plan.msg.PlanningAction, planning, auto_start=False)
182  act_s.start()
183 
184  rate = rospy.Rate(20)
185 
186  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
187  rate.sleep()
188 
189 
190 if __name__ == '__main__':
191  main()
